title: Did 58 Scientific Papers Published in 2017 Say Global Warming is a Myth?
subtitle: An article on Breitbart News used flawed interpretations from a climate skeptic blog to amplify a grossly inaccurate understanding of climatological research.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: A total of 58 peer-reviewed papers published in the first half of 2017 conclude that global warming is a myth.
